name: SerializerFlatBuffersTest
description: Tests for the SerializerFlatBuffers class, focusing on serialization and deserialization of RTree objects using FlatBuffers.

methods.name: roundTrip
methods.signature: void roundTrip(InternalStructure structure, boolean backpressure) throws Exception

methods.name: serialize
methods.signature: static void serialize(RTree<Object, Point> tree, long t, File file, FileOutputStream os, Serializer<Object, Point> fbSerializer) throws IOException

methods.name: deserialize
methods.signature: static void deserialize(InternalStructure structure, File file, Serializer<Object, Point> fbSerializer, boolean backpressure) throws Exception

test_cases.name: testSerializeRoundTripToFlatBuffersSingleArray
test_cases.description: Tests the serialization and deserialization of an RTree with a single array internal structure.

test_cases.name: testSerializeRoundTripToDefaultStructure
test_cases.description: Tests the serialization and deserialization of an RTree with the default internal structure.

test_cases.name: testSerializeRoundTripToFlatBuffersSingleArrayBackpressure
test_cases.description: Tests the serialization and deserialization of an RTree with a single array internal structure with backpressure.

test_cases.name: testSerializeRoundTripToDefaultStructureBackpressure
test_cases.description: Tests the serialization and deserialization of an RTree with the default internal structure with backpressure.

test_cases.name: testInputStreamNotAsLongAsExpected
test_cases.description: Tests that a RuntimeException is thrown when the InputStream does not provide the expected number of bytes.

test_cases.name: testInputStreamReturnsArrayInSmallChunks
test_cases.description: Tests that the InputStream can handle reading an array in small chunks.
